Streams Java Operator API Samples

Samples for the Java Operator API.

Java source files and compiled classes for samples are contained in
$STREAMS_INSTALL/lib/com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.jar

A SPL sample toolkit for Java operators is provided in
$STREAMS_INSTALL/samples/spl/feature/JavaOperators
Within the toolkit sample Java primitive operators are provided using the Java Operator API samples within these SPL namespaces:

  • com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.operators - Java primitive operators from the com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.operators package
  • com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.sources - Java primitive operators from the com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.sources package
  • com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.windows - Java primitive operators from the com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows package
  • com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.sinks - Java primitive operators from the com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.sinks package

Package
Description
com.ibm.streams.flow.samples.javaprimitives
Samples of testing Java primitive operators using the test framework.
com.ibm.streams.function.samples.jvm
Sample SPL Java native functions related to the Java Virtual Machine.
com.ibm.streams.function.samples.math
Sample mathematical SPL Java native functions.
com.ibm.streams.operator.control.patterns
Patterns for operators that use with the Job Control Plane.
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.operators
Sample SPL Java primitive operators.
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.patterns
Sample abstract patterns for operators.
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.sinks
Sample SPL Java primitive operators that deliver data to external systems from input streams.
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.sources
Sample SPL Java primitive operators that source data as streams.
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows
Sample window-based SPL Java primitive operators and listeners.
